title: New: Manou – Loving You
body:
Sixteen year old **Manou** found online success with her debut track, _Sadie_, a real early 00’s throwback.

Her much anticipated follow-up, _Loving You_, is perhaps not as immediate in nature but is equally as exciting, showing yet again that she knows how to find a killer chorus. Working alongside PNUT (Amy Winehouse, Foxes, Sparks) on her debut album, you can bet that she’s got a host of hits up her sleeve.
